channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elon Musk’s X may finally settle $500M severance lawsuit
item.description: Elon Musk's X is settling a severance lawsuit with former Twitter employees.

item.title: 7 Best Sunrise Alarm Clocks to Snag Before the Fall 2025 Time Change

item.title: As India bans real-money games, Dream Sports, MPL start pulling the plug
item.description: Several Indian startups, including Dream Sports, MPL, and Zupee, are shutting down their real-money games after parliament passed a bill banning such ...

item.title: Africa Is Buying a Record Number of Chinese Solar Panels
item.description: Energy-starved countries on the continent have reluctantly turned to coal and gas for decades. Cheap Chinese solar panels are now finally changing the...

item.title: Gas power plants approved for Meta’s $10B data center, and not everyone is happy
item.description: Meta's massive data center will draw power from three gas-fired power plants producing 2.25 gigawatts.

item.title: Ecosia has offered to take ‘stewardship’ of Chrome. And it’s not a bad idea.
item.description: Berlin-based nonprofit search engine Ecosia has asked a U.S. judge to turn Chrome into a foundation it controls, funding billions in climate projects.

item.title: Kanye West Said Memecoins ‘Prey On Fans.’ Then He Apparently Launched One
item.description: A new cryptocurrency promoted by Kanye West’s X account soared in value—then crashed, inflicting losses on the majority of investors.

item.title: Take $15 Off ‘Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3+4’ Remasters Right Now
item.description: Darkslide your way to gaming nostalgia for just $35.

item.title: Trump Is Betting Big on Intel. Will the Chips Fall His Way?
